text: Arthur Torrell Anderson (July 1, 1916 – April 4, 1983) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Akron Goodyear Wingfoots in the National Basketball League and averaged 0.7 points per game. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Akron Goodyear Wingfoots players Category:Amateur Athletic Union men's basketball players Category:American men's basketball players Category:Augustana (Illinois) Vikings men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: Art Anderson (basketball)
